item.title: CVE-2024-34570|2024-05-08T10:37:23.462Z -- Xpro -- Xpro Elementor Addons
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Xpro Xpro Elementor Addons allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Xpro Elementor Addons: from n/a through 1.4.3.
